chunks.chunk_text: Hello hello, you guys, and welcome to another episode of 15 Minutes Cafe每週三來到15 Minutes Cafe 英語咖啡館,喝一杯老師們的本週主題特調,一起探討國際文化、時事、職涯、網路和音樂等多元主題,輕鬆吸收主題相關的詞彙、慣用語,還有常用例句。So today, let's welcome Clem in the house!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.208_ 白色情人節準備什麼樣的回禮是NG - Whats the deal with White Day and what t.json

chunks.chunk_text: So this week, we have Clem in the house for a special reason, because we have learnt, or technically, I have learnt that this week is a very special week.I used to only celebrate Valentine's on February 14, and I was educated recently, thanks to you guys for telling me there's something called a White Valentine's Day, or also known as a White Day, and it bugged me because I never grew up with that.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.208_ 白色情人節準備什麼樣的回禮是NG - Whats the deal with White Day and what t.json
